name: Primary Election - Last Day to Postmark Voter Registration Application
shortDesc: July 29, 2022 is the last day to postmark a voter registration application to vote in the 2022 Primary Election on August 23, 2022.

name: Primary Election - Change of Address
shortDesc: Primary Election occurs August 23, 2022. Change of address received by August 3, 2022 for the 2022 Primary Election must be processed.
address: Citywide

name: Primary Election - Last Day to Postmark an Application for an Absentee Ballot
shortDesc: August 8th is the last day to postmark an absentee ballot application to vote in the 2022 Primary Election on August 23, 2022.
address: Citywide
